column4: Help! I've downloaded the x64bit flash for Ubuntu 10.04 and the only thing in the tarball is a .so file. What to do???
check about:plugins and see if it is listed
do I need to reinstall the package from the repositories in addition to putting the .so file in the plugins folder
either use the package or use the file from adobe, not both
flash from youtube runs fine, but I upgraded to 10.04 and now hulu is broken
you've got to use the 32bit flash with wrapper
It worked fine under 9.10--what happened? Should I install 32-bit firefox?
ah, I see what you said
